The movement from sense-certainty to perception reveals how consciousness must abandon its naive belief in immediate knowledge. Through this process, consciousness learns that truth emerges through mediation and reflection upon its own activity.
Terror is the state of being in a state of fear. It is the state of being in a state of fear. It is the state of being in a state of fear.

content: Freedom is the state of being free from fear. It is the state of being free from fear. It is the state of being free from fear.
